amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.catchline: Handicapped parking infractions; sections, how construed.
amendatorysection.para: Sections 18-1741.01 to 18-1741.07 shall not be construed to affect the rights, lawful procedures, or responsibilities of peace officers or law enforcement agencies using the handicapped parking citation for handicapped parking infractions.
